title: Smoking El Gueguense with the Wise Man, Nick Melillo
itunes:title: Smoking El Gueguense with the Wise Man, Nick Melillo
description:
On this week of The Cigar Authority we welcome into the studio Nick Melillo aka Nick R Agua as we smoke El Gueguense and discuss his career from cigar shop owner to running the Drew Estate factory before starting his own Foundation Cigar Company.

Also, Dave discusses the history of geek sticks, we catch up on the mail bags and all the usual madness known as The Cigar Authority.
